name: Eden Valley (Alpha release)
description:
Eden Valley tells us the story of Kirito, and its arrival in the village of the same name. However, when he arrives, he notices a strange atmosphere and decides to improve his skills as a fighter and magician in order to fight the cold winds coming from the mountains.

This game is an alpha version, of about 15-20 minutes, of a product developed by three developers as their first project. Any comments are welcome.

Game developed by Adrián Ollero Jiménez, Cristian Gómez Portes and Enrique Garrido Pozo.
